name: elsargento
description: * **Project Vision**: Off‑grid, eco‑community "ranch | ranchet | manor" concept near La Paz (Mesa de la Uva) * **Target Buyer**: Mexican‑American/Hispanic expatriates returning with savings; aspirational lifestyle * **Branding**: “Ranchets” (2 500 m²), “Ranchets Deluxe” (5 000 m²), “Manor” (10 000 m²) * **Lifestyle Hook**: Club de playa access, equestrian facilities, pickle‑ball & padel courts, off‑grid autonomy
